house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1951 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 1939 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include view, patio, air conditioning, satellite dish.
house_listing.firm_name: Miami Real Estate Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Fenced, Satellite Dish, Smoke Detector, Walk-In Closet(s)
